description.raw:
Use this pull request to hash out the frame semantics we'll use. There are currently many different places frames and their representation have been discussed. The result of this pull request will be the ground-truth on frame semantics.

This will resole issue #3.

Additional sources frame information:

[ SDF reference geometry](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_design/src/33bc24ee42157acfa3c252ed9195c6639526e177/sdf_reference_geometry/sdf_reference_geometry.md?at=smart_pointers&fileviewer=file-view-default)

[Ignition Physics: Frame semantics](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GAZ/pages/659926/Ignition+Physics#IgnitionPhysics-FrameSemantics)

Once approved, the person who merges this should also do the following:

1. Update the atlassian wiki with a link to this design document.
2. Update the SDF gazebo_design document with a link to this design document.
3. Poke @nkoenig to figure out a good way to make these design documents more transparent to external users.
